project_abstract.cdata: The project would provide funds to subborrowers in Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region to finance investments for the development of citrus orchards and other tree crops, aquaculture, livestock and agro-processing. Project funds would be channelled through the Agricultural Bank of China (ABC) to subborrowers comprising collective units, individual farmers and households, and state-owned enterprises.  The project would also include a technical assistance conponent for the institutional strengthening of ABC, comprising overseas fellowships, local training, expert services for planning an improved information and data management system, and future project preparation, and supporting equipment.  A major objective of the project is strengthening the project appraisal capability and methodology of ABC.  The project would increase the production of higher value foods which are in short supply and for which demand is growing rapidly.  Increased annual production would be about 430,000 tons of fruits and 11,000 tons of aquatic products, mainly fish.  In addition, lending for the establishment or expansion of animal breeding and fish nurseries would help satisfy the growing demand from individual households for improved stock, while increasing the supply of red meat, poultry and eggs. The project would provide funds to sub-borrowers in Hubei Provinc finance investments for the development of aquaculture, livestock, and crops. Specifically the project would finance the following components aquaculture involving the culture of freshwater fisheries; (ii) livest comprising beef/draft cattle and poultry; (iii) citrus crops, mandarin and pomelo; and (iv) technical assistance for the institutional streng of the Agricultural Bank of China (ABC) in Hubei.

P003418.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>第一农村信贷项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目将向广西壮族自治区次贷款人提供资金，支持投资发展柑橘和其它果树种植、水产养殖、畜牧生产和农产品加工。项目资金向通过中国农业银行向集体单位、单个农户和工业企业等次贷款人拨付。项目也将提供技术援助，旨在增强中国农业银行的能力。技术援助内容包括国外留学奖学金、国内培训、针对规划建设完善信息和数据管理系统的专家服务、今后项目准备工作以及辅助设备。本项目的一大目标是增加中国农业银行的项目评估能力，完善其项目评估方法。本项目将增加供应不足且需求迅速增长的高价值食品产量。水果新增年产量将达到43万吨左右，水产品新增年产量（主要为鱼类）将达到1.1万吨。此外，为新建或扩建家畜和鱼类繁殖场而提供的贷款，有助于满足单个农户日益增长的良种需求，同时增加红肉、禽产品和鸡蛋供应。项目将向湖北省次贷款人提供资金，支持投资发展水产养殖、畜牧生产和农作物生产。项目将特别资助以下内容：（1）水产养殖，包括淡水鱼养殖；（2）畜牧生产，包括肉牛、耕牛和家禽养殖；（3）柑橘和柚子生产；（4）旨在加强中国农业银行湖北分行制度能力的技术援助。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
